LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: ――Rumi-chan.

LABEL: 0x2E0
STRING: That's what Tokiwa had muttered.

LABEL: 0x302
STRING: No, she had called out.

LABEL: 0x322
STRING: To whom?

LABEL: 0x336
STRING: To the girl lying in front of me, of course―to Hikari.

LABEL: 0x370
STRING: Did Tokiwa know her?

LABEL: 0x3A2
STRING: What was their relationship?

LABEL: 0x3C2
STRING: I suppressed my boiling curiosity and the doubts welling up inside me.

LABEL: 0x3FE
STRING: Yes, there was something else I needed to do right now.

LABEL: 0x42A
STRING: Time was of the essence.

LABEL: 0x4A5
STRING: 「I'll go get Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x4CB
STRING: 「Wait here――」

LABEL: 0x4F3
STRING: 「――And take care of Hikari.」

LABEL: 0x57F
STRING: 「――Got it.」

LABEL: 0x676
STRING: I left the emergency room without waiting for her to nod in response.

LABEL: 0x6B6
STRING: I came to a stop as soon as I rushed into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x6E4
STRING: Hiragino... He should be in the wheelhouse getting Yukari.

LABEL: 0x712
STRING: Just as I turned to run with my destination settled...

LABEL: 0x7A6
STRING: 「Katagiri-san! Reiri-san――」

LABEL: 0x7D7
STRING: Yukari appeared in front of me―

LABEL: 0x8C4
STRING: as well as Hiragino and%NTouri.

LABEL: 0x8E6
STRING: What perfect timing.

LABEL: 0x90C
STRING: I ran over to them in relief without slowing down.

LABEL: 0x95E
STRING: Seeing my impatience, Yukari immediately realized something.

LABEL: 0xA7E
STRING: 「...Did something happen?」

LABEL: 0xAAD
STRING: 「A survivor.」

LABEL: 0xAC7
STRING: 「There's someone in the emergency room!」

LABEL: 0xBE9
STRING: 「Let's hurry!」

LABEL: 0xCA1
STRING: Four people's worth of footsteps echoed through the hallway.

LABEL: 0xD83
STRING: We rushed back into the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xDB1
STRING: We ran to the pressurization room, which was located at the far end of the room.

LABEL: 0xDE1
STRING: Tokiwa had her back turned to us.

LABEL: 0xE01
STRING: She had both of her hands on Hikari's shoulders, shaking her slowly.

LABEL: 0xE4C
STRING: 「...Come on... Wake up...!」

LABEL: 0xEA8
STRING: Touri turned pale at the scene before her.

LABEL: 0xED0
STRING: Hiragino covered her eyes and pushed her straight back into the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xF14
STRING: On the other hand, Yukari, her face pale as well, grabbed Tokiwa and pulled her away from Hikari.

LABEL: 0x104D
STRING: 「Stay away from her!」

LABEL: 0x10E9
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun, I need to examine her now.」

LABEL: 0x1177
STRING: Hiragino sat Touri on the bed.

LABEL: 0x11A1
STRING: Her back was toward me, and it looked like she was sitting there obediently.

LABEL: 0x11E3
STRING: When Hiragino came back and tried to approach Hikari, Yukari stood in front of him.

LABEL: 0x129D
STRING: 「Even you shouldn't get close to her, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x12D3
STRING: 「Step back, please.」

LABEL: 0x12F8
STRING: She gave an order in a cold tone.

LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: Yes, it wasn't a request but an order.

LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: Said as the chief attendant of the <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: 「...Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x146A
STRING: 「What authority do you have to say that?」

LABEL: 0x149E
STRING: 「She's obviously seriously injured. As a doctor, I can't just leave her there.」

LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: 「Do you want to die?」

LABEL: 0x1581
STRING: I was startled by her sudden and forceful words.

LABEL: 0x15AF
STRING: Hiragino had raised his hand to push Yukari out of the way but stopped suddenly.

LABEL: 0x1600
STRING: 「...What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x162F
STRING: 「I asked you if you wanted to die, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x1675
STRING: 「If you go near her――」

LABEL: 0x169B
STRING: 「――You'll get infected.」

LABEL: 0x16ED
STRING: The two glared at each other.

LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: Hiragino, who wanted to treat this obviously injured person before him right away.

LABEL: 0x1762
STRING: And Yukari, who stood in front of him.

LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: She was two heads shorter than the man before her, but she didn't budge an inch.

LABEL: 0x1849
STRING: But... why?

LABEL: 0x186D
STRING: Why couldn't we get close to her?

LABEL: 0x1893
STRING: Instead of a reason, the only thing she offered was the word "infected."

LABEL: 0x18D9
STRING: Infected... by what?

LABEL: 0x18F9
STRING: What in the world was Hikari infected with...? What would we be infected with if we got close?

LABEL: 0x1A4C
STRING: ――And, how did Yukari know that?

LABEL: 0x1A93
STRING: 「Momoi. Do you know this girl?」

LABEL: 0x1AF5
STRING: She didn't respond.

LABEL: 0x1B15
STRING: She kept her mouth shut tight, not averting her gaze.

LABEL: 0x1B51
STRING: I could feel her strength of will.

LABEL: 0x1B69
STRING: I had no idea what she was thinking.

LABEL: 0x1BA1
STRING: But, for her to be this serious...

LABEL: 0x1BDA
STRING: 「Tell me what you know...」

LABEL: 0x1C42
STRING: 「――What do you mean by "infection?"」

LABEL: 0x1C9C
STRING: 「...We don't have much time.」

LABEL: 0x1CC0
STRING: 「She's getting weaker as we speak.」

LABEL: 0x1D2E
STRING: 「Tch...

LABEL: 0x1D99
STRING: Are you fine with letting her die?!」

LABEL: 0x1DF1
STRING: Hiragino's voice was filled with anger.

LABEL: 0x1E0B
STRING: Yukari's body trembled like a daughter being scolded by her father, but she didn't back down.

LABEL: 0x1E67
STRING: ...There was no way it was okay to let her die.

LABEL: 0x1E93
STRING: Of course Yukari would know that.

LABEL: 0x1ECD
STRING: So, was there some other reason she couldn't back down?

LABEL: 0x1F77
STRING: Growing impatient, Hiragino clicked his tongue.

LABEL: 0x1FAB
STRING: He turned his back to the pressurization room and walked to the emergency room. When he returned, he had a surgical mask and gloves with him.

LABEL: 0x2017
STRING: He glared at Yukari as he put them on with familiar gestures.

LABEL: 0x211E
STRING: 「It should be fine like this.」

LABEL: 0x21AC
STRING: 「――Out of the way!」

LABEL: 0x21ED
STRING: He passed right by Yukari, who opened her mouth to say something, and reached out his hand to Hikari.

LABEL: 0x2237
STRING: He stroked her forehead and examined her face.

LABEL: 0x2265
STRING: The bloodstains on her made her look pitiful, and her complexion wasn't great either...

LABEL: 0x2300
STRING: On the other hand, Yukari, having been ignored by Hiragino, had a devastated expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x2356
STRING: Even if this wasn't the time for it, I felt kind of sorry for her...

LABEL: 0x23D5
STRING: 「Damn it... There's cyanosis.」

LABEL: 0x240E
STRING: Hiragino took out something from his pocket.

LABEL: 0x244E
STRING: That was――

LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: A small instrument that could be mistaken for a syringe.

LABEL: 0x248E
STRING: An electronic sound rang out as he pressed the switch.

LABEL: 0x24BA
STRING: This wasn't the first time I had seen that.

LABEL: 0x24EA
STRING: He had used the same thing when we'd rescued Reiri yesterday.

LABEL: 0x2528
STRING: Just like back then, Hiragino took the girl's slender hand and put the device on her fingertip.

LABEL: 0x257C
STRING: He then used a light to check her pupils as well as her pulse.

LABEL: 0x25BC
STRING: There was a beep from the instrument.

LABEL: 0x25E6
STRING: ――Red.

LABEL: 0x26F4
STRING: 「This is urgent――」

LABEL: 0x2710
STRING: 「Make way.」

LABEL: 0x276D
STRING: While shaking her as little as possible, but as quickly as he could...

LABEL: 0x27AB
STRING: ...Hiragino picked Hikari up and laid her down on the examination table with practiced motions.

LABEL: 0x27F1
STRING: I could see her entire body now that she was lying there.

LABEL: 0x282B
STRING: I couldn't see any abnormalities on her limbs, but I could only focus on external injuries.

LABEL: 0x28ED
STRING: 「Significant blood loss from the head...」

LABEL: 0x2921
STRING: 「It's a wonder she's still alive.」

LABEL: 0x295A
STRING: Alive――

LABEL: 0x2976
STRING: Hearing him put it into words made me feel relieved for a moment.

LABEL: 0x29B0
STRING: Hikari... Thank God, she was alive.

LABEL: 0x29DA
STRING: However, that didn't mean we could relax just yet.

LABEL: 0x2A1B
STRING: 「Blood transfusion...」

LABEL: 0x2A35
STRING: 「She needs a blood transfusion.」

LABEL: 0x2A53
STRING: 「Her blood type is――」

LABEL: 0x2A88
STRING: 「That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x2AA7
STRING: Yukari's denial didn't give any leeway.

LABEL: 0x2B8F
STRING: Hiragino glared at her in irritation yet again.

LABEL: 0x2BBF
STRING: She winced at his murderous gaze but showed no further signs of backing down.

LABEL: 0x2C1A
STRING: 「This girl's blood is special.」

LABEL: 0x2C4D
STRING: Special blood...?

LABEL: 0x2C7C
STRING: 「And how the hell do you know that?」

LABEL: 0x2D3F
STRING: Yukari hesitated at his obvious question.

LABEL: 0x2D65
STRING: As if puzzled about whether to answer or not and, if so, how to answer.

LABEL: 0x2DB1
STRING: Eventually, she let out a sigh of resignation.

LABEL: 0x2E53
STRING: 「Type AB Rh-negative.」

LABEL: 0x2E75
STRING: 「That's her blood type.」

LABEL: 0x2F2C
STRING: Rh-negative.

LABEL: 0x2F46
STRING: I'd heard of it before.

LABEL: 0x2F66
STRING: A rare blood group that didn't have the D antigen among Rh antigens.

LABEL: 0x2F9F
STRING: Of course, compared to Bombay blood, for example, it was a far more common type.

LABEL: 0x2FF3
STRING: That said, the frequency of its appearance was...

LABEL: 0x302C
STRING: 「One in two thousand.」

LABEL: 0x304A
STRING: 「There's no way we'd have her type at hand, no matter how you look at it.」

LABEL: 0x308E
STRING: 「If you try to give her a blood transfusion, it will kill her.」

LABEL: 0x30D7
STRING: Now it was Hiragino's turn to be silent.

LABEL: 0x30FF
STRING: We were faced with her near-lethal amount of blood loss, and a transfusion wasn't an option...

LABEL: 0x328F
STRING: 「...But... how do you know her blood type...?」

LABEL: 0x3349
STRING: 「...Not just her blood type.」

LABEL: 0x3377
STRING: 「Name, age, height, weight...」

LABEL: 0x33A1
STRING: 「All of her personal information is in ROMLES' records.」

LABEL: 0x33FC
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x341A
STRING: Hikari was in ROMLES' records?

LABEL: 0x3440
STRING: Why...? For what reason?

LABEL: 0x3462
STRING: While I was struck with confusion, Hiragino's eyes widened next to me as if he'd realized something.

LABEL: 0x3522
STRING: 「...It can't be!」

LABEL: 0x35AC
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x35C6
STRING: 「It's her... She's the carrier of <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x3607
STRING: <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x3623
STRING: I was sure I'd heard that word before.

LABEL: 0x364B
STRING: Right... That was what that man from ROMLES had said in the darkness of the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x3697
STRING: So, was <Alice> an infectious disease or something?

LABEL: 0x36CD
STRING: If so, we could get infected if we made contact with her.

LABEL: 0x3767
STRING: 「But... that's not possible.」

LABEL: 0x379F
STRING: 「Why is <Alice> inside the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x37D9
STRING: Hiragino couldn't hide his confusion and impatience.

LABEL: 0x3866
STRING: Yukari hung her head.

LABEL: 0x3897
STRING: 「How could those idiots at ROMLES allow this to happen?」

LABEL: 0x38EA
STRING: 「I don't know... I don't know how she got past the security, or if someone helped her...」

LABEL: 0x39A4
STRING: Yukari snuck a glance at me as she said it.

LABEL: 0x39DC
STRING: ...Did she think I had helped Hikari board this ship?

LABEL: 0x3A3D
STRING: I hurried to deny it, but Yukari didn't seem to seriously suspect me.

LABEL: 0x3A9E
STRING: 「But that doesn't matter right now. There's only one thing that's clear.」

LABEL: 0x3AEC
STRING: 「We must bring her back alive.」

LABEL: 0x3BB9
STRING: 「We cannot afford to lose someone as precious as an <Alice> carrier.」

LABEL: 0x3C02
STRING: Yukari resolutely appealed to the logic of her organization.

LABEL: 0x3C30
STRING: And, Hiragino was trying to fulfill his own duty as a doctor.

LABEL: 0x3C64
STRING: Their goals were aligned.

LABEL: 0x3D17
STRING: There wasn't a way, however.

LABEL: 0x3D3B
STRING: No means.

LABEL: 0x3D55
STRING: Nothing could be done for her.

LABEL: 0x3D79
STRING: Not even a next best thing...

LABEL: 0x3D99
STRING: She was about to die on the examination table before us.

LABEL: 0x3DD3
STRING: She had been alive all this time.

LABEL: 0x3DF9
STRING: I had thought she was long dead, but still... why did she have to die?

LABEL: 0x3E49
STRING: She had survived only to die here――

LABEL: 0x3E8C
STRING: 「――You said it's a matter of blood type, right?」

LABEL: 0x3F6C
STRING: Smoothly.

LABEL: 0x3F84
STRING: The girl in a kimono, who had been watching us from a distance, walked up to us.

LABEL: 0x3FCC
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x4054
STRING: 「If you can perform a blood transfusion, then...」

LABEL: 0x408C
STRING: 「Use my blood.」

LABEL: 0x40BD
STRING: An unexpected offer.

LABEL: 0x40EB
STRING: Saying that, Tokiwa rolled up her sleeve.

LABEL: 0x411F
STRING: 「As we said, her blood type――」

LABEL: 0x4158
STRING: 「That won't be a problem.」

LABEL: 0x417D
STRING: She looked down at Hikari.

LABEL: 0x41AD
STRING: Her eyes were somewhat warm as she gazed at her...

LABEL: 0x426F
STRING: 「She's my sister, after all.」

LABEL: 0x42B4
STRING: Hikari had told me that she had an older sister――

LABEL: 0x42E4
STRING: So, it wasn't Touri, but Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x43DB
STRING: 「...I-Impossible!」

LABEL: 0x4408
STRING: Yukari had trouble getting the words out of her throat.

LABEL: 0x442E
STRING: She shook her head slowly like she couldn't believe it.

LABEL: 0x4487
STRING: 「I've never heard of her having a sister, even at ROMLES...」

LABEL: 0x44E3
STRING: 「How is such a thing――」

LABEL: 0x4579
STRING: 「You don't believe me?」

LABEL: 0x45FF
STRING: Yukari was bewildered.

LABEL: 0x4617
STRING: In contrast, Tokiwa was calm.

LABEL: 0x4645
STRING: She spoke nonchalantly with her eyes downcast.

LABEL: 0x4680
STRING: 「I'm not asking you to trust my words alone.」

LABEL: 0x46C2
STRING: 「Please, check my blood type.」

LABEL: 0x46F8
STRING: 「What do you think the chances are for someone with a rare blood type like hers to be on this ship?」

LABEL: 0x475B
STRING: Rh-negative blood.

LABEL: 0x477B
STRING: If she really was Hikari's sister, a transfusion of her blood would save her.

LABEL: 0x48A5
STRING: 「There's no other way.」

LABEL: 0x48F6
STRING: 「...Got it.」

LABEL: 0x4933
STRING: Hiragino believed Tokiwa's eyes.

LABEL: 0x495F
STRING: His doctor's coat fluttered as he prepared the equipment.

LABEL: 0x499B
STRING: Tokiwa nodded reassuringly and looked down at Hikari again.

LABEL: 0x4A08
STRING: 「...Hang in there.」

LABEL: 0x4A2B
STRING: Her quiet voice echoed through the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4D5C
STRING: To prevent transmission of the <Alice>-virus, Tokiwa's blood was drawn on a bed in the examination room.

LABEL: 0x4DBA
STRING: The blood being drained was pooling inside a transparent plastic bag.

LABEL: 0x4E64
STRING: Red blood.

LABEL: 0x4E7C
STRING: The same kind that was flowing through Hikari's body.

LABEL: 0x4F6C
STRING: ――Tokiwa and Hikari.

LABEL: 0x4F8C
STRING: They were both kind of similarly eccentric, now that I thought about it.

LABEL: 0x4FD2
STRING: Whether that was because they were related, I didn't know, but...

LABEL: 0x5008
STRING: I wondered what kind of sisters they were before they had boarded the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x504D
STRING: I realized something as I was imagining it.

LABEL: 0x50F2
STRING: Hikari was under the control of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x5126
STRING: I wasn't sure how strict their "control" was, but I was sure the two of them couldn't have lived like normal sisters.

LABEL: 0x519A
STRING: Yukari had said she didn't know why Hikari was on board the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x521D
STRING: However, I felt I could understand why she'd wanted to get on this ship.

LABEL: 0x531A
STRING: Drops of blood continued to pool in silence, one by one.

LABEL: 0x534C
STRING: No one uttered a word.

LABEL: 0x5372
STRING: We couldn't say a thing.

LABEL: 0x53CE
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x541A
STRING: Eventually, Tokiwa started breathing quietly in her sleep.

LABEL: 0x5452
STRING: She was fine just a moment ago...

LABEL: 0x5488
STRING: Her blood pressure must have dropped, thanks to all the blood being drained.

LABEL: 0x54BC
STRING: It might be inappropriate given that we were trapped at the bottom of the sea with no way out,

LABEL: 0x550E
STRING: but I hoped her dreams were peaceful, at the very least.

LABEL: 0x554E
STRING: Before long, enough blood was collected for the transfusion.

LABEL: 0x558A
STRING: Hiragino returned from the treatment room carrying the blood bag.

LABEL: 0x5640
STRING: 「It really is Rh-negative... There shouldn't be any problems.」

LABEL: 0x56DF
STRING: 「I checked the blood just to be sure, but my worries were unnecessary.」

LABEL: 0x571C
STRING: A rare blood type match.

LABEL: 0x573E
STRING: It was clear that Tokiwa and Hikari were related.

LABEL: 0x5782
STRING: But, the sisters' true reunion wouldn't be fulfilled until she woke up.

LABEL: 0x57CE
STRING: Not until they both recognized each other.

LABEL: 0x587E
STRING: 「Well... let's begin the treatment then.」

LABEL: 0x58A7
STRING: 「...Please do.」

LABEL: 0x58D0
STRING: 「You can leave it to me.」

LABEL: 0x5BEC
STRING: After her blood was taken,

LABEL: 0x5C2E
STRING: Tokiwa was left sleeping in the examination room while Hiragino went to the treatment room where Hikari was lying.

LABEL: 0x5C60
STRING: Her treatment must be going on right now.

LABEL: 0x5C8E
STRING: Yukari and I decided to wait and stay out of the treatment room so as not to disturb Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x5CE6
STRING: I walked to the bed and reunited with the girl sitting on it, hanging her head.

LABEL: 0x5DC1
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x5E09
STRING: Reiri's twin sister was practically crying.

LABEL: 0x5E45
STRING: She'd been like this ever since she saw Hikari inside the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x5EA5
STRING: She was muttering something in a low, inaudible volume.

LABEL: 0x5F16
STRING: 「I'm sorry... I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x5F49
STRING: It was not a mere apology.

LABEL: 0x5F7B
STRING: Oozing out of her were an intense sense of remorse―and guilt.

LABEL: 0x5FC7
STRING: I recalled the theory that Tokiwa had proposed earlier on the bridge.

LABEL: 0x600B
STRING: A girl had hit her head on the bridge and had collapsed while bleeding.

LABEL: 0x6043
STRING: Afterward, someone had dragged her out of there and shoved her into the pressurization room――

LABEL: 0x60EE
STRING: ...There was no evidence.

LABEL: 0x6112
STRING: But, if the sprinklers were intentionally activated in order to wash away Hikari's blood, then...

LABEL: 0x616E
STRING: I couldn't help but look at her with suspicion.

LABEL: 0x625F
STRING: Touri was getting increasingly downhearted.

LABEL: 0x6293
STRING: It'd be a problem if I tried to pursue the matter now.

LABEL: 0x62D9
STRING: As a result, Touri herself eventually confessed in a slightly louder voice than before, while I could only hold my tongue.

LABEL: 0x6340
STRING: 「It's my fault.」

LABEL: 0x635E
STRING: 「Because I couldn't stop her... I couldn't stop Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x63F7
STRING: 「I... How could I――」

LABEL: 0x642A
STRING: Touri's voice gradually began to tremble.

LABEL: 0x6450
STRING: The palms covering her face were trembling as well.

LABEL: 0x6484
STRING: ――This was bad.

LABEL: 0x649E
STRING: I could tell that her heart was strained to its limit.

LABEL: 0x64E0
STRING: The same thing had happened before when Reiri was in danger.

LABEL: 0x652C
STRING: Touri was, for better or worse, a normal high school student.

LABEL: 0x6566
STRING: I couldn't let her carry all that weight by herself.

LABEL: 0x65BE
STRING: I wanted to lighten her burden.

LABEL: 0x65DE
STRING: It seemed that my sentiment was shared by Yukari as well.

LABEL: 0x6612
STRING: She sat down on the bed next to Touri.

LABEL: 0x6652
STRING: ...Her feet couldn't reach the floor and were dangling in the air.

LABEL: 0x667E
STRING: Yukari called out to her gently while looking up at Touri from the side.

LABEL: 0x6791
STRING: 「Can you tell me what happened?」

LABEL: 0x67FD
STRING: 「If you don't feel comfortable talking about it, I won't force you to.」

LABEL: 0x6835
STRING: 「But I think that talking might make you feel a little better――」

LABEL: 0x689A
STRING: 「...Yeah, I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x6919
STRING: 「I'll tell you... because I think this is something I need to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x69A6
STRING: And as she wiped away her tears, Touri began to speak.

LABEL: 0x69E2
STRING: It was partly just as I had expected.

LABEL: 0x6A86
STRING: ――The time was last night.

LABEL: 0x6AA8
STRING: Touri had gone to check on Reiri right after our playtime was over.

LABEL: 0x6B55
STRING: That was when she had found her in the hallway, dragging a bleeding girl.

LABEL: 0x6C57
STRING: She had blacked out momentarily. When she came to, both Reiri and the bleeding girl were collapsed on the floor.

LABEL: 0x6CCC
STRING: 「I didn't know what had happened, so I panicked...」

LABEL: 0x6D0A
STRING: 「But, Reiri was the only one there. I didn't want her to become under suspicion...」

LABEL: 0x6D69
STRING: So, she had moved the bleeding girl somewhere nearby...

LABEL: 0x6D8D
STRING: The pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x6DC1
STRING: She then activated the sprinklers because she didn't want anyone to see

LABEL: 0x6E07
STRING: the blood left on the floor or on Reiri.

LABEL: 0x6E35
STRING: ...That was the entirety of Touri's confession.

LABEL: 0x6FBA
STRING: 「It's my fault...」

LABEL: 0x6FDA
STRING: 「Because I didn't stop Reiri at that time... all of this happened.」

LABEL: 0x702D
STRING: 「――Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x704B
STRING: 「Why didn't you tell us sooner...?」

LABEL: 0x708A
STRING: Firmly but quietly, Yukari admonished Touri.

LABEL: 0x70C2
STRING: Touri nodded.

LABEL: 0x70EC
STRING: ...Still, something was bothering me.

LABEL: 0x7118
STRING: Certainly, if Touri had stopped Reiri, this might not have happened.

LABEL: 0x716E
STRING: But the more serious problem was that she had hidden Hikari, effectively concealing evidence.

LABEL: 0x71BE
STRING: We had been unaware of her presence because of it.

LABEL: 0x720D
STRING: 「I was scared...」

LABEL: 0x722D
STRING: 「...That Reiri was going to go away again.」

LABEL: 0x7268
STRING: ――What did she mean by "again?"

LABEL: 0x7298
STRING: It was true that Reiri had disappeared a number of times before.

LABEL: 0x72D6
STRING: And needless to say, Touri's behavior had turned almost deranged each time it had happened.

LABEL: 0x7332
STRING: No matter how close they might be or how much of a siscon she was, it was abnormal.

LABEL: 0x7380
STRING: Some kind of trauma had to be at the root of it all.

LABEL: 0x73B4
STRING: But what was it, exactly?

LABEL: 0x73E2
STRING: After hearing Touri's confession, Yukari chose her words carefully.

LABEL: 0x7427
STRING: 「...Did you touch her during all that?」

LABEL: 0x7469
STRING: 「...Her blood, that is.」

LABEL: 0x74FD
STRING: 「Yeah... Did I do something wrong?」

LABEL: 0x7597
STRING: 「...I hope it's nothing, but...」

LABEL: 0x75CF
STRING: 「Both you and Reiri may be infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x76AC
STRING: Touri repeated the word with a question mark above her head.

LABEL: 0x7718
STRING: The name of a girl who was often the center of our discussions.

LABEL: 0x7748
STRING: Lost in the land of mirrors and passing through various illusions, her story was all a dream.

LABEL: 0x77A4
STRING: It should already be clear that this <Alice> we were talking about was a virus.

LABEL: 0x77FC
STRING: But why was the virus called that?

LABEL: 0x7844
STRING: Yukari had still remained tight-lipped about it...

LABEL: 0x78CF
STRING: 「Yukari-san, please.」

LABEL: 0x78F1
STRING: 「Tell us about <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x7993
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x79B4
STRING: 「I understand that it's a ROMLES secret. I know you didn't want to tell us about Hikari, either.」

LABEL: 0x7A1A
STRING: Yukari was still a member of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x7A48
STRING: It wasn't about good or bad, but that the ethics of her organization had to come first.

LABEL: 0x7AAC
STRING: I understood that.

LABEL: 0x7ACE
STRING: I understood that, but...

LABEL: 0x7AEC
STRING: 「...I think you're at your limit.」

LABEL: 0x7B80
STRING: 「...Are you saying I'm inadequate?」

LABEL: 0x7BAB
STRING: 「That's not it. To begin with, it's absurd to think that one person alone could devise a plan to get everyone out of the <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x7BF6
STRING: which has sunk to the bottom of this sea, safely.」

LABEL: 0x7C4E
STRING: 「There's no point in trying to do that... Hiragino and I want to do everything we can to help as well.」

LABEL: 0x7CB0
STRING: 「And in order to do that, there are things we have to know.」

LABEL: 0x7D75
STRING: 「Please――」

LABEL: 0x7D9E
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x7DDB
STRING: I bowed my head.

LABEL: 0x7DF5
STRING: I knew I was asking for the impossible.

LABEL: 0x7E1F
STRING: I had no idea what the best course of action was or what to base my judgment on in an emergency like this.

LABEL: 0x7E81
STRING: And yet, I was asking her to add to our anxiety by divulging possibly useless information...

LABEL: 0x7EDE
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, please raise your head.」

LABEL: 0x7F0F
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x7F97
STRING: 「I'm only trying to figure out what to do in order to save us.」

LABEL: 0x7FDD
STRING: 「I'm not the kind of person you should bow to.」

LABEL: 0x8022
STRING: Finally, Yukari put the palm of her hand on her forehead and exhaled deeply.

LABEL: 0x80D8
STRING: 「Haaah...」

LABEL: 0x80F4
STRING: 「...Nothing is going the way I want it to.」

LABEL: 0x8187
STRING: 「I don't deal well with things not going according to plan, I've been told.」

LABEL: 0x81D6
STRING: Yukari laughed self-deprecatingly.

LABEL: 0x81F4
STRING: There was a hint of loneliness on her face.

LABEL: 0x8231
STRING: 「I mustn't make the situation any worse.」

LABEL: 0x82CC
STRING: 「I'll tell you about it―about <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x8323
STRING: And so she did.

LABEL: 0x8347
STRING: She spoke about how <Alice> was a highly lethal virus.

LABEL: 0x8391
STRING: That even if you escaped death, there would still be aftereffects, and that a method of treatment had not yet been established.

LABEL: 0x83E7
STRING: About how your body's biological clock was destroyed as an aftereffect of the virus, causing you to sleep forever.

LABEL: 0x843F
STRING: And the fact that its natural host was yet to be confirmed.

LABEL: 0x8473
STRING: She talked about how there had been very few cases of infection so far, and how Hikari was under ROMLES' control as one of the few carriers of <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x8551
STRING: 「Despite the fact that it's such a fearsome virus, its existence is not generally known.」

LABEL: 0x85B7
STRING: 「This is due to ROMLES withholding information about <Alice> and Hikari, one of the only known infected people.」

LABEL: 0x874C
STRING: A lone girl sheltered inside a research institution.

LABEL: 0x8772
STRING: She was treated as a research subject, and her existence wasn't even made known to the public.

LABEL: 0x87B2
STRING: ...A girl who had called herself a poet.

LABEL: 0x88FB
STRING: 「How did she get on board the <SHEEP III> if she was under ROMLES' control...?」

LABEL: 0x8953
STRING: 「I don't know how she was able to get on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x89A5
STRING: 「Was there someone inside ROMLES who orchestrated it, or was it done from the outside? If so, what was their goal?」

LABEL: 0x8A64
STRING: 「...And I still don't know if I should believe that Tokiwa-san is her older sister.」

LABEL: 0x8ACA
STRING: 「But now, there's nothing more I can tell you.」

LABEL: 0x8B09
STRING: Yukari's eyes were clear.

LABEL: 0x8B2B
STRING: Just as she said, she must have told us everything she knew.

LABEL: 0x8BE4
STRING: However, I couldn't say anything in return.

LABEL: 0x8C1E
STRING: The information she divulged was very straightforward.

LABEL: 0x8C4C
STRING: <Alice>, Hikari, and their respective relationships.

LABEL: 0x8C8C
STRING: All of it had such an excessive impact that I couldn't think straight.

LABEL: 0x8D3F
STRING: A virus that either killed you or put you to sleep.

LABEL: 0x8D79
STRING: I was sure it wasn't that simple, but I couldn't believe a serious problem like that had reared its head in addition to the submarine sinking.

LABEL: 0x8DE7
STRING: The intricate path to our goal of escaping that had appeared before us was gradually becoming clearer.

LABEL: 0x8E49
STRING: But, the path that emerged from the fog was steeper and longer than we had expected.

LABEL: 0x8EF6
STRING: Still.

LABEL: 0x8F0C
STRING: We were moving forward steadily.

LABEL: 0x8F3A
STRING: We mustn't give up.

LABEL: 0x8F5A
STRING: We couldn't give up until the very end――

LABEL: 0x901E
STRING: Just then, the door to the treatment room opened.

LABEL: 0x9048
STRING: As Hiragino appeared, Touri timidly called out to him.

LABEL: 0x914F
STRING: 「How is she?」

LABEL: 0x9180
STRING: 「...I've given her emergency treatment for now.」

LABEL: 0x91B0
STRING: 「We'll have to wait until she wakes up.」

LABEL: 0x91E7
STRING: 「Okay...」

LABEL: 0x923E
STRING: Having barely said that, Hiragino plopped down on the bed next to Yukari with a heavy thud.

LABEL: 0x9292
STRING: Emergency treatment.

LABEL: 0x92AA
STRING: Hiragino, whose nerves must have been strained during the procedure, was finally able to take a break.

LABEL: 0x9306
STRING: Yukari didn't reproach him as he rolled face-up on the bed.

LABEL: 0x9362
STRING: What was that stubble-bearded old man doing...?

LABEL: 0x93BA
STRING: Yukari called out to the completely exhausted Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x945E
STRING: 「...I just heard from Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9494
STRING: 「There's a possibility that Reiri-san came into contact with <Alice> as well.」

LABEL: 0x94DA
STRING: 「If, by any chance, she's infected... we must administer a cure as soon as possible.」

LABEL: 0x9595
STRING: 「This time... for sure.」

LABEL: 0x95BE
STRING: Yukari displayed a strong emotion.

LABEL: 0x95E2
STRING: The way she spoke in an annoyed voice, biting back her hatred, was not like her usual rational self.

LABEL: 0x9652
STRING: 「Why are you so――」

LABEL: 0x96E6
STRING: 「Do I still need to explain the danger <Alice> poses?」

LABEL: 0x9733
STRING: 「No, that's not what I meant.」

LABEL: 0x9757
STRING: 「Yukari-san... or maybe it's ROMLES...」

LABEL: 0x979F
STRING: 「I just don't understand why you're so fixated on this particular virus.」

LABEL: 0x985F
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x9880
STRING: Hesitating, she turned to Hiragino for help as if wondering whether she should say something or not.

LABEL: 0x999B
STRING: 「I don't know. I don't know about ROMLES' circumstances... or about your decision.」

LABEL: 0x99D7
STRING: 「But, if you've decided to tell them everything, then I think you should tell him.」

LABEL: 0x9A5C
STRING: Yukari listened to his words with her eyes closed, her resolve seemingly strengthened.

LABEL: 0x9ABF
STRING: 「...Understood.」

LABEL: 0x9AE6
STRING: Whispering to herself quietly, Yukari opened her eyes again while displaying rational determination.

LABEL: 0x9B9A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9BB9
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x9BDE
STRING: 「I thought that I shouldn't share this with you because it's a personal matter, but...」

LABEL: 0x9C2A
STRING: 「I've decided to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x9C5B
STRING: About what? It went without saying.

LABEL: 0x9C8B
STRING: About the person connecting me and Yukari.

LABEL: 0x9CB7
STRING: About the truth only she knew――

LABEL: 0x9CEE
STRING: 「I'll tell you about the accident seven years ago――」

LABEL: 0x9D9C
STRING: 「――About what happened to your sister.」
